text: We ordered the food catering service for our event and it was great! The food was super tasty â€” our guests loved it. Their teh was superb too. They delivered right on time, which made everything easy for us. Definitely recommend!

Ordered from Mr Fazil for my house warming. Very good service. They came to set up the buffet set on time. Made sure everything was ready before my guest came.

Food was very tasty. Even my guest asked where we ordered from.

Thank you Mr Fazil and team.

Hands down the best! Any & every event I have been getting his Teh Tarik. Super fast response & accommodating to last minute request always! Thank you so so much always bro. Definitely Recommended ðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸ

Ordered for Deepavali Dinner, from Mr Fazil. The delivery was prompt, set up was neat and tidy. The food was superb and delicious.  All the guest were very pleased with the food and it's taste. The pricing was reasonable with delivery.

Nasi Padang, Biryani (Wednesdays & Fridays), Nasi Lemak (only Thursdays).

Been patronising here for over a year and the food never disappoints. Fried chicken is fantastic, a must have! Always packed on Thursdays. Chill spot for lunch, comfortable and casual. Boss and staff are friendly. Definitely a must makan spot!
